entry.title: linveo.com - Intel KVM VPS with 4GB RAM and NVMe disk from $2.85/month - Ohio/Texas/Arizona
entry.author: lnx
entry.content:
Welcome to the Linveo 2026 Intel sales thread! In 2025, Linveo continued our momentum with new hardware in all three locations to support growing demand for Intel VPS with high RAM options. All locations feature 10 Gigabit connections and NVMe SSDs. The CPUs are a mixture of Intel Xeon E5-2690 v4 or Xeon Gold 6140. We offer 7 backup slots that can be scheduled or created on demand. Give us a try today.

This year's 26% off coupon applies to all Intel VPS packages, but only certain ones are posted here due to the rules. Please note that the Windows KVM VPS packages have been separately out by group from the Linux/BSD based options. Please order accordingly!

As with our prior sales threads, if you comment your invoice number for your order, you will get DOUBLE BANDWIDTH.

Coupon code LET26INTELKVM2026

Looking Glass
Ohio Network KVM VPS
Texas Network KVM VPS
Arizona Network KVM VPS

Payment Methods

  • Credit Cards
  • PayPal
  • Crypto options via Coinbase Commerce

Package Groups

Intel KVM VPS
Windows KVM VPS

Intel KVM 4GB
4096 MB RAM
2 CPU Cores
25 GB NVMe SSD
2000 GB Bandwidth
Price: $2.85/month with coupon code LET26INTELKVM2026

Intel KVM 8GB
8192 MB RAM
4 CPU Cores
50 GB NVMe SSD
2000 GB Bandwidth
Price: $4.07/month with coupon code LET26INTELKVM2026

Intel KVM 16GB
16,384 MB RAM
6 CPU Cores
100 GB NVMe SSD
4000 GB Bandwidth
Price: $8.14/month with coupon code LET26INTELKVM2026

Intel KVM VPS Features

  • Intel Xeon E5-2690 or Xeon Gold 6140 CPUs
  • Choose from AlmaLinux, Arch Linux, CentOS, Debian, Fedora, Rocky Linux, Ubuntu, Windows, or BSDs
  • VirtFusion Control Panel
  • DDoS Mitigation
  • 1 IPv4 IP
  • /64 IPv6 Subnet
  • Scheduled or on demand backups
